artist: Artist: George Grosz; Printer: Hermann Birkholz, Berlin; Publisher: Der Malik-Verlag, Berlin
portfolio: From Plate 2 from Die Räuber: Neun Lithographien zu Sentenzen aus Schillers "Die Räuber" (The Robbers: Nine Lithographs on Maxims from Schiller's "The Robbers"
title: "Under my rule it shall be brought to pass, that potatoes and small-beer shall be con sidered a holiday treat; and woe to him who meets my eye with the audacious front of health. Haggard want, and crouching fear, are my insignia; and in this livery I will clothe ye."
